Class ec.vat.DGCMap 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.vat.DGCMap
public class DGCMap
extends Object
This is a table representing potential arcs between DGCEntries and DGCExits. The user explicitly fills in the rows and the columns, and then, on demand, can ask the system to annotate the arcs.

DGCMap()
Construct an initially-empty DGCMap.

setEntries(DGCEntry[], int)
Set the array of DGCEntries for this DGCMap.
setExits(DGCExit[], int)
Set the array of DGCExits for this DGCMap.
update()
Update the arcs stored in this DGCMap to be consistent with the current state-of-affairs in this Vat.

DGCMap 
 public DGCMap()
Construct an initially-empty DGCMap.

setEntries 
 public void setEntries(DGCEntry entries[],
                        int size)
Set the array of DGCEntries for this DGCMap. The array is only considered up to size entries. This allows one more lazily grow the actual storage.

Parameters:
entries - the array of entries
size - the used size of the array
setExits 
 public void setExits(DGCExit exits[],
                      int size)
Set the array of DGCExits for this DGCMap. The array is only considered up to size entries. This allows one more lazily grow the actual storage.

Parameters:
exits - the array of exits
size - the used size of the array
update 
 public void update()
Update the arcs stored in this DGCMap to be consistent with the current state-of-affairs in this Vat.
